reason: Raw dump of table fragments at top of answer (e.g. '(재직기간 중 총 3년) | 3년 이내'). Question asks about 경력 impact but answer mainly discusses 신분 보유/직무 종사 금지. Poorly formatted table data mixed with narrative content.

Specific question about which leave types allow vacancy replacement. Answer accurately lists all 11 types from page 126, correctly states 6-month minimum, and includes consecutive-use special provisions. All content verified against source.
Duplicate of q_3_0144. Same page 126 결원보충 content with nearly identical answer covering the same 11 leave types and 6-month condition. Question is only trivially different ('언제부터' vs '어떤 것들').
Duplicate of q_3_0144/q_3_0146. Additionally contains unverified claim '생사불명 휴직은 결원보충 불가' which does not appear on source page 126.

Specific question about consequences of not returning after leave expires. Answer accurately covers 직권면직 provisions from page 126 라), 30-day return requirement from page 125, and reinstatement procedure. All key claims verified in source.
Duplicate of q_3_0144/q_3_0146/q_3_0147. Fourth entry with essentially identical 결원보충 content from page 126.
Duplicate of q_3_0146 (near-identical question '언제 가능한가요' vs '언제부터 가능한가요'). Also contains unverified claim '생사불명 휴직(3개월 이내)은 결원보충 불가' not found on page 126.
Duplicate of q_3_0144 and five other entries. Sixth near-identical 결원보충 Q&A from page 126 in this batch.

Massive hallucination. Source page 126 only mentions '출산휴가와 육아휴직은 연속하여 6개월 이상 사용하는 경우 결원보충 가능' but answer fabricates extensive details: specific date examples, 90/120-day periods, 다태아 provisions, 배우자 출산휴가 10일, 쌍둥이 scenarios, 육아휴직수당 details -- none found on cited source page.
Accurate reproduction of page 126 휴직사유 소멸자의 복직절차 section (가~라). All four items match source verbatim. Legal references correctly cited. Question is specific enough.
